trans-unit.source: A service behavior that enables you to specify the action to take when an unhandled exception occurs within a workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Um comportamento de serviço que permite que você especifique a ação a ser tomada quando uma exceção não tratada ocorre dentro de um serviço de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> and WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior dictate the behavior of the runtime when an exception is not handled in the workflow; however, WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior has the option of leaving a suspended workflow in the persistence store, while <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> does not.
trans-unit.target: Ambos <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>e WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior determinam o comportamento de tempo de execução quando uma exceção não é tratada no fluxo de trabalho; no entanto, o WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior tem a opção de deixar um fluxo de trabalho no repositório de persistência, enquanto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>não.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reason for this is that what happens to a suspended workflow is host-specific, and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is not.
trans-unit.target: A razão para isso é o que acontece com um fluxo de trabalho específico do host, e <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>não é.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: To implement this functionality using <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>, create a custom <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> that has this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar essa funcionalidade usando <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>, criar um personalizado <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant>com esse comportamento.</xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this behavior see [Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como usar esse comportamento, consulte [extensibilidade de Host do serviço de fluxo de trabalho](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action to take when an unhandled exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ação a ser executada quando ocorre uma exceção sem tratamento.

trans-unit.source: The Action property can be set to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction> values.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ação pode ser definida como uma da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction>valores.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método para dar suporte o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: O host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The endpoints exposed by the service.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de extremidade expostos pelo serviço.

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters required to implement the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de associação necessários para implementar o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método para dar suporte o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: O host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método para dar suporte o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: O host de serviço.
